question: The Government of India (GoI) has recently declared which of the following time periods as the Year of construction technology?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has recently addressed the Construction Technology India 2019 conference on \'Global Housing Technology Challenge\', in New Delhi. Here, PM Modi declared the 2019-2020 as the Year of construction technology in a bid to increase the use of modern technology in the construction sector. The purpose of the 2-day conference was to identify innovative and globally established technologies that can be used in the Indian context. In the event, developers, academia, technology providers, researchers etc. participated. Those technologies which are identified during the conference will be invited to design and build lighthouse projects of around one thousand housing units each in Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Jharkhand, Tripura and Uttar Pradesh.
